Hi Folks,

I'm looking for a Java library which can evaluate a URI against =
a given URI template. What would you recommend? Basically I need to check w=
hether a URI, matches with a given URI template and extract the variable va=
lues etc.

The URI templates web page lists [1] as an option for Java, but =
this doesn't seem to be a complete implementation.

Thanks,
Hiranya

[1] - =
http://www.metanotion.net/software/urlmapper/
